languages.text: {n}Маражай выглядит так, словно и не было никакого крушения. Дьявольская ловкость друкари явно позволила ему избежать не то чтобы травм — даже, кажется, пыли на доспехе.{/n} "Смерть была так... щекочуще близко, м? Почаще бы ваши монкайские технологии преподносили подобные сюрпризы".

{n}Marazhai looks as if there had been no crash at all. The Drukhari's impossible agility clearly allowed him to avoid more than just injury: there does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "Death was... tantalisingly close there, hmm? I wish your mon-keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай выглядит так, словно и не было никакого крушения. Дьявольская ловкость друкари явно позволила ему избежать не то чтобы травм — даже, кажется, пыли на доспехе.{/n} "Смерть была так... щекочуще близко, м? Почаще бы ваши монкайские технологии преподносили подобные сюрпризы".

There does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "The death was... tantalisingly close, hmm? I wish your mon'keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."

languages.text: {n}A simple vista, Marazhai no parece haber sufrido ningún efecto por el impacto. La agilidad imposible del Drukhari no solo le ha permitido evitar las heridas: ni siquiera parece haber una mota de polvo en su armadura.{/n} «La muerte ha estado... tentadoramente cerca, ¿mmm? Ojalá vuestra tecnología mon-keigh nos diera estas sorpresas más a menudo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks as if there had been no crash at all. The Drukhari's impossible agility clearly allowed him to avoid more than just injury: there does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "Death was... tantalisingly close there, hmm? I wish your mon-keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."

traits.locale_text: {n}A simple vista, Marazhai no parece haber sufrido ningún efecto por el impacto. La agilidad imposible del Drukhari no solo le ha permitido evitar las heridas: ni siquiera parece haber una mota de polvo en su armadura.{/n} «La muerte ha estado... tentadoramente cerca, ¿mmm? Ojalá vuestra tecnología mon'keigh nos diera estas sorpresas más a menudo».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、まるで事故などなかったかのような振る舞いだ。デュカーリの驚異的な敏捷性によって、怪我以上の自体は避けられたようだ。彼の鎧には塵ひとつついていないようだ。{/n} 「死は…うずくまるほど近くにあった、だろ？お前のモン＝ケイの技術がまた、このような驚きをもたらしてくれればいいのだが」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks as if there had been no crash at all. The Drukhari's impossible agility clearly allowed him to avoid more than just injury: there does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "Death was... tantalisingly close there, hmm? I wish your mon-keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、まるで事故などなかったかのような振る舞いだ。デュカーリの驚異的な敏捷性によって、怪我以上の自体は避けられたようだ。彼の鎧には塵ひとつついていないようだ。{/n} 「死は…うずくまるほど近くにあった、だろ？お前のモンケイの技術がまた、このような驚きをもたらしてくれればいいのだが」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看起来仿佛根本没有遭遇事故一样。黑暗灵族敏捷得令人难以置信，他不仅避开了一切伤害，甚至连盔甲都几乎没有沾上任何灰尘。{/n}“死亡是……如此接近，如此诱人，不是吗？真希望你们猴子的科技能多给我带来些这样的惊喜。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks as if there had been no crash at all. The Drukhari's impossible agility clearly allowed him to avoid more than just injury: there does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "Death was... tantalisingly close there, hmm? I wish your mon-keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看起来仿佛根本没有遭遇事故一样。黑暗灵族敏捷得令人难以置信，他不仅避开了一切伤害，甚至连盔甲都几乎没有沾上任何灰尘。{/n}“死亡是……如此接近，如此诱人，不是吗？真希望你们猴子的科技能多给我带来些这样的惊喜。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sieht aus, als wäre überhaupt nichts passiert. Die unfassbare Geschicklichkeit des Drukhari hat ihn nicht nur jede Verletzung vermeiden lassen, auf seiner Rüstung befindet sich zudem anscheinend nicht ein einziges Staubkorn.{/n} "Der Tod war ... erschreckend nahe, wie? Ich wünschte, Eure Chem-Pan-Sey-Technologien würden derlei Überraschungen häufiger bewerkstelligen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks as if there had been no crash at all. The Drukhari's impossible agility clearly allowed him to avoid more than just injury: there does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "Death was... tantalisingly close there, hmm? I wish your mon-keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sieht aus, als wäre überhaupt nichts passiert. Die unfassbare Geschicklichkeit des Drukhari hat ihn nicht nur jede Verletzung vermeiden lassen, auf seiner Rüstung befindet sich zudem anscheinend nicht ein einziges Staubkorn.{/n} "Der Tod war ... erschreckend nahe, wie? Ich wünschte, Eure Chem-Pan-Sey-Technologien würden derlei Überraschungen häufiger bewerkstelligen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai demeure imperturbable, comme si l'accident n'avait jamais eu lieu. L'agilité surnaturelle du Drukhari lui a manifestement évité plus que de simples contusions, et vous ne décelez pas le moindre grain de poussière sur son armure.{/n} « Eh bien, nous sommes passés à un cheveu de la mort, n'est-ce pas ? Dommage que vos technologies mon-keigh ne nous réservent pas davantage de surprises de ce genre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks as if there had been no crash at all. The Drukhari's impossible agility clearly allowed him to avoid more than just injury: there does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "Death was... tantalisingly close there, hmm? I wish your mon-keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai demeure imperturbable, comme si l'accident n'avait jamais eu lieu. L'agilité surnaturelle du Drukhari lui a manifestement évité plus que de simples contusions, et vous ne décelez pas le moindre grain de poussière sur son armure.{/n} « Eh bien, nous sommes passés à un cheveu de la mort, n'est-ce pas ? Dommage que vos technologies mon'keigh ne nous réservent pas davantage de surprises de ce genre. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, asansör hiç çakılmamış gibi etrafına bakınıyor. Drukhari'nin olağanüstü çevikliği onu sadece yaralanmaktan kurtarmamış. Zırhının üstünde bir toz zerresi bile yok âdeta.{/n} "Ölüm... Neredeyse heyecan verecek kadar yakındı sanki. Mon-keigh teknolojilerinizden keşke daha sık böyle sürprizler yapsa."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks as if there had been no crash at all. The Drukhari's impossible agility clearly allowed him to avoid more than just injury: there does not even seem to be any dust on his armour.{/n} "Death was... tantalisingly close there, hmm? I wish your mon-keigh technologies delivered such surprises more often."
